detaileddescription.para: Dynamic graph "glue code" responsible for the instanciation of the graph and the python interpreter. Provide a ROS server in order to create distant ROS clients.
Copyright (c) 2019, New York University and Max Planck Gesellschaft.
This is a ros package so it should be in a ROS environment. One can still test its compilation by using the following instruction:

Inherite from the class DynamicGraphManager and overload the three functions responsible for the hardware: `virtual void initialize_hardware_communication_process()`
`virtual void get_sensors_to_map(VectorDGMap&)`
See demo and unit tests for more information on the API. Doxygen informations are available by calling: `catkin_make -DBUILD_DOCUMENTATION=ON`
